BBox - Class in bRigid
Box as rigidBody
BBox(PApplet, float, float, float, float, float, float, float) - Constructor for class bRigid.BBox
if mass is set to 0: the body will be static
BBox(PApplet, float, float, float, float) - Constructor for class bRigid.BBox
 
BBox(PApplet, float, Vector3f, Vector3f, boolean) - Constructor for class bRigid.BBox
if mass is set to 0: the body will be static, if inertia is false, the body will collide, but not rotate

BConvexHull - Class in bRigid
ConvexHull as rigidBody, List of vertices, PShapes or .obj files as input and calculates its convexHull for collisionDetection
BConvexHull(PApplet, float, <any>, Vector3f, boolean) - Constructor for class bRigid.BConvexHull

BForce - Class in bRigid
linear force
BForce(Vector3f) - Constructor for class bRigid.BForce

BForceLocalSwarm - Class in bRigid
 
BForceLocalSwarm() - Constructor for class bRigid.BForceLocalSwarm
default Constructor input: rangeRadius for Seperation 25, rangeRadius for Alignment 25, rangeRadius for Cohesion 25, defaultScale: 1.5;1.0;1.0, default maxSpeed: 3.0, default maxForce .05

BObject - Class in bRigid
BObject is the basic RigidBody Object, all other RigidBodies extend BObject and inherent all attributes ConstructionInfo by Richard Brauer -- http://www.r6753.com
BObject(PApplet) - Constructor for class bRigid.BObject
 
BObject(PApplet, float, CollisionShape, Vector3f, boolean) - Constructor for class bRigid.BObject
for advanced users; use the specific Shape-Classes
BObject(PApplet, float, BObject, Vector3f, boolean) - Constructor for class bRigid.BObject
takes an existing rigid object as input and reuse its collisionShape for performance issues use this constructor if you can reuse your collisionGeometry
BObject(PApplet, float, BObject, Vector3f, Vector3f, boolean) - Constructor for class bRigid.BObject

BPhysics - Class in bRigid
solver class, physics world; the BPhysics class acts like a container; every rigid object or spring should be added here
BPhysics() - Constructor for class bRigid.BPhysics
initializes a BPhysics World instance, default with a AxisSweep3 broadphase
BPhysics(Vector3f, Vector3f) - Constructor for class bRigid.BPhysics
initializes a BPhysics World instance, with a rigid boundingBox
BPlane - Class in bRigid
infinite non-moving (static) collision plane.
BPlane(Vector3f, Vector3f) - Constructor for class bRigid.BPlane
infinite plane placed with Vector3f position; orientation by Vector3f normal; normal direction points towards the expected collisions
bRigid - package bRigid
